name: Prayer Battle MMO
description:
Prayer Battle MMO is an online virtual world where Believers can gather to pray together, have Bible Studies online, go on prayer walks along the beach or in the forest, or do a few prayer-related quests. Eventually we intend to implement a prayer request system where people can post and pray for prayer requests in the game, but presently it is just an online world where people can meet together and  create their own worship experiences. There is a  beautiful world to explore, and more content is planned to come. Currently the game is for Windows PC computers.

All donations go to  help the developers in creating this virtual world for you. Thank you for your support!
